Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. Centered on Miyazawa’s own life, this film depicts his adolescence in the country, the ideals he pursued, and the ending of his short life through Chicago’s summer in the year after he graduated from agricultural school.
